participant_1.background:
I like to spend time with my dad and help him recover from his recent heart attack.
I love to go hiking because it's a way to challenge myself and experience the outdoors.
i played football in high school.
I love to grow sunflowers.
i enjoy walks on the beach.

participant_2.background:
I'm adjusting to my new home in PA, but I'm grateful to have my pets to keep me company.
i like to chat with my friends.
I do yoga to keep my balance.
i like watching ufc fights.
i lift weights , but i never do squats.

content.text: I am new here, how is it going?
Hey there! It is going great! Just moved to PA, but I am happy here with my pets
Oh cool, where are you from originally?
I moved from CA, but I am happy to be here. How about you?
I am from NC, but I just moved to the area too.
Oh wow, what brought you here?
I am going to school here, and I am really excited to be here
That is great! What are you studying?
I am studying business management. I hope to one day own my own business
That is a great goal! I am sure you will do great.
Thank you! Do you have any hobbies?
I like to do yoga, watch UFC fights, and lift weights
Oh cool, I love to hike, play football, and grow sunflowers.
That is awesome! I love that you are so active
Thank you! I try to be.
It shows! How are you liking PA so far?
It is great! I love the people and the scenery.
That is great to hear! I am glad you are enjoying it here
